info.title: CMS API Reference
info.description: Reference for the Brightcove CMS API, used to access and manage your media library. To test API requests, you can use our API Testing Tools. For permissions needed for OAuth credentials, see API Operations

post.description: Create a new video object in the account. Note: this does not ingest a video file - use the Dynamic Ingest API for ingestion

parameters.name: Create_VideoBody
parameters.description: Create a new video object in the account. Note: this does not ingest a video file - use the Dynamic Ingest API for ingestion

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

403.description: BAD_VALUE: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field

404.description: RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: The api couldn't find the resource you requested

405.description: METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint

409.description: REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE: You attempted to create a video with a reference id that is already in use, or add a reference id to a video which is already used by another video

422.description: ILLEGAL_FIELD: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field

429.description: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

get.description: Gets a page of video objects

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

400.description:
INVALID_SORT: sort parameter specified and invalid field 
ILLEGAL_QUERY: The search string syntax was invalid - example

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

403.description: NOT_AVAILABLE: The resource you are requesting is  unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support

404.description: RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: Resource not found

429.description: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

500.description:
UNKNOWN: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later. 
TIMEOUT: Server likely too busy; try again later.

patch.description: Update a video's metadata note that this API does not ingest any media files - use the Dynamic Ingest API for ingestion. Also note that replacing WebVTT text tracks is a two-step operation - see Add WebVTT Captions for details.

parameters.name: Update_VideoBody
parameters.description: Update a video's metadata note that this API does not ingest any media files - use the Dynamic Ingest API for ingestion. Also note that replacing WebVTT text tracks is a two-step operation - see Add WebVTT Captions for details.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

400.description:
AD_CONFIG_INACTIVE: Ad configuration specified in an SSAI request is inactive 
AD_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND: Ad configuration specified in an SSAI request was not found

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

403.description: BAD_VALUE: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field

404.description: RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: The api couldn't find the resource you requested

405.description: METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint

409.description: REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE: You attempted to create a video with a reference id that is already in use, or add a reference id to a video which is already used by another video

422.description:
ILLEGAL_FIELD: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field 
VALIDATION_ERROR: the JSON data was not valid - error messages vary depending on the problem

429.description: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

500.description: UNKNOWN: an unknown internal error occurred - this might be a temporary system issue, but if the problem persists, it is likely an uncaught error in the request - contact Support

503.description: TIMEOUT: Server likely too busy - try again later

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

409.description: REFERENCES_EXIST: The video is in one or more manual playlists

412.description: PRE_CONDITION_FAILED: usually this means the caller provided an ETag that didn't match the version of the video

429.description: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

500.description: INTERNAL_ERROR: Error in the backend

delete.description: Deletes one audio track for a video by its ID Dynamic Delivery only

parameters.name: audio_track_id
parameters.description: the id for the audio track, formed as 'language_variant'

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code for the audio track from the subtags in http://www.iana.org/assignments/language-subtag-registry/language-subtag-registry (default can be set for the account by contacting Brightcove Support) Dynanic Delivery only

parameters.name: is_default
parameters.description: whether this is the default audio track for the video Dynanic Delivery only

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: the type of audio track (default can be set for the account by contacting Brightcove Support) Dynanic Delivery only

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

405.description: METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint

post.description: Establishes up to 10 endpoints that video changes should be sent to. Any change in video metadata will trigger a video change event and a notification — changes to assets used by the video will not trigger change events.

parameters.name: Create_SubscriptionBody
parameters.description: Establishes up to 10 endpoints that video changes should be sent to. Any change in video metadata will trigger a video change event and a notification — changes to assets used by the video will not trigger change events.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

403.description: NOT_AVAILABLE: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable

404.description: RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: The api couldn't find the resource you requested

405.description: METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint

422.description: Unprocessable_Entity: 1) You already have a subscription for the video-change event that delivers to that address; 2) the endpoint or events field is missing from the request; 3) you already have 10 subscriptions to this event

429.description: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

500.description:
UNKNOWN: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later. 
TIMEOUT: Server likely too busy; try again later.

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

403.description: NOT_AVAILABLE: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable

404.description: RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: The api couldn't find the resource you requested

405.description: METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint

429.description: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

500.description:
UNKNOWN: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later. 
TIMEOUT: Server likely too busy; try again later.

complete.description: whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true

ad_keys.description: string representing the ad key/value pairs assigned to the video. Key/value pairs are formatted as key=value and are separated by ampersands. For example: "adKeys": "category=sports&live=true"

clip_source_video_id.description: The ID of the source video that was clipped to produce this video or null if this video is not a clip of another video

custom_fields.description: map of fieldname-value pairs; values have a maximum length of 1024 single-byte characters Note: be sure to use the internal name for the field, not the display name

delivery_type.description: video delivery type - remote, static_origin, dynamic_origin or unknown

drm_disabled.description: if true, the video is not DRM-packaged

digital_master_id.description: asset id of the digital master

folder_id.description: id of the folder that contains the video

has_digital_master.description: whether video has an archived master than can be used for retranscoding

offline_enabled.description: whether video is enabled for offline viewing

original_filename.description: the original file name for the uploaded video

published_at.description: start date-time of first activation in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format

reference_id.description: video reference-id (must be unique within the account)

state.description: state determines whether the video is playable or not

sharing.description: map of the sharing properties for the video

updated_at.description: when the video was last modified

time.description: time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527

metadata.description: optional metadata string (512 single-byte characters maximum)

force-stop.description: whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

countries.description: array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

exclude_countries.description: if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

restricted.description: whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

by_external_acct.description: whether the video was shared from another account

by_id.description: id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video

source_id.description: id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video

to_external_acct.description: whether the video is shared to another account

by_reference.description: whether the video is shared by reference

default.description: whether this is the default track

starts_at.description: start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format

ends_at.description: end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format

src.description: URL for the default image source image
URL for a image source image

codec.description: the video codec for the rendition

container.description: the video container for the rendition

remote.description: whether the source is a remote asset

steam_name.description: the stream name on the CDN

uploaded_at.description: date/time when the video was uploaded

id.description: ID for the audio track formed as language_variant

language.description: language code for the audio track

duration.description: URL the duration of the audio track in milliseconds

encoding_rates.description: array of encoding rates for the audio track renditions in KBPS

state.description: the current state of the ingest job

error_code.description: the error code if the job failed

error_message.description: the error message if the job failed

updated_at.description: when the status was last updated

priority.description: priority of the job (normal or low)

playlists.description: array of EXPLICIT playlist ids that contain the video

audio_only.description: whether this assest has an audio track only

cdn_origin_id.description: id on the origin CDN if any

complete.description: whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true

video_count.description: number of videos in the folder

favorite.description: whether playlist is in favorites list

type.description: the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type

video_ids.description: array of video ids (EXPLICIT playlists only)

search.description: search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)

max_custom_fields.description: maximum number of custom fields for the account

enum_values.description: array of string values for select type fields

id.description: data name for the field (used to access it in searches, etc.)

required.description: whether field must have a value before video can be active

id.description: data name for the field (used to access it in searches, etc.)

required.description: whether field must have a value before video can be active
